channel.title: (sovled)
channel.description:
I just got my vps and i installed it, i installed java in it i transfered my source to it via teamviewer but now when i want to run my server in the vps by pressing on run.bat the bat file opens and then closes really fast idk what the problem is? can someone help please!
(EDIT)Now i get this error(EDIT) [IMG]http://i253.photobucket.com/albums/hh55/Kingen50cent/goldka.jpg[/img]

item.title: (sovled)

this is the code i use:

@echo off Title Project Gold color 40 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" Project gold PAUSE

@Kingen50cent wrote:

and you dont use such a code like you gave in a run.bat
you use this code:

@echo off color 81 title Namez0rhere java -Xmx500m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Cmon i need help man pleeeease

@relmitos wrote:

@echo off
"C:/path to java..../java.exe" Server
pause
